uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.servlet

Class SessionServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.servlet.WebappServlet
          • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.servlet.SessionServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    APISessionServlet, BecomeUserServlet, BounceAuthServlet, StaticServlet, UserServlet

    public abstract class SessionServlet
extends WebappServlet
    abstract servlet class that does the basic authentication. retreives the current person and passes it to the doPost method.
    Author:
    spb
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
